source.sqlReaderQuery:
select Firstname +' '+ Lastname as 'FullName of Customer' ,Name as 'Product Brought by customer',Salesperson ,orderqty as 'Total quantity ordered',sum(orderqty)*Unitprice as 'Worth Of Order'
from [SalesLT].[Customer],[SalesLT].[Product],[SalesLT].[SalesOrderHeader],[SalesLT].[SalesOrderDetail]
where [SalesLT].[Customer].customerId = [SalesLT].[SalesOrderHeader].customerId and
[SalesLT].[Product].ProductID = [SalesLT].[SalesOrderDetail].ProductID and
[SalesLT].[SalesOrderHeader].salesorderID = [SalesLT].[SalesOrderDetail].salesOrderID
group by FirstName,LastName,Name,Salesperson,orderqty,UnitPrice
